data: PED NEPH AMB Eculizumab Infusion q2week for 6 months (Day of Treatment)
Remove 60 min after administration of eculizumab infusion if patient is stable
Hypotension, arrhythmia, bronchospasm, angioedema, pruritus, urticaria, fever, chills or rigor or any other new acute discomfort or signs of allergic reaction
Call provider if any vital sign changes
